Constructors

FleeOnDamageData(float, float, float, float, float, float)

Contains data pertaining to creating the FleeOnDamage CreatureAction.

public FleeOnDamageData(float evaluatePriority, float swimVelocity = 10, float damageThreshold = 10, float fleeDuration = 2, float minFleeDistance = 5, float swimInterval = 1)

Parameters

evaluatePriority float

The priority for this CreatureAction, expected to be in the range [0, 1].

swimVelocity float

How fast the creature will flee in m/s.

damageThreshold float

How much damage must be taken before the creature will begin to flee.

fleeDuration float

How long the creature flees for.

minFleeDistance float

At least how far in meters the creature will flee when attacked.

swimInterval float

How many seconds are between each "swim".
